title: Won game Should Be in Promos but i am not ? WTF ? HELP
body: I just won my game, and I should be in my promos ??????? But after game client didn't work, so i re-log  i had 86 LP and normally per win i get 20Lp, I should be in promos but i am not and i can see my game, then y not I am in promos? WTH is wrong i want my promos back its not fair {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} like seriously ?
